summary.create: This action will allow to create one user per request.
summary.findAllByRole: This action will retrieve all users by role.
summary.findOne: This action will retrieve the user that matches against the provided uuid.
summary.update: This action will update the fields inside the request against the uuid matched user.
summary.createSubscription: This action will allow to create one subscription to any uuid provided sponsor.
summary.findAllSubscriptions: This action will retrieve all the subscriptions for any uuid provided sponsor.

errors.notFound: User which provided uuid was not found.
errors.badRequest: User request contains errors or query params are incorrect.

success.findAllByRole: List of matched users by role.
success.update: Returns how many users were updated.
